name: Gtexinator
short_description: Gtexinator is a Linux texture synthesis program written in C with a GTK+ user interface. Gtexinator allows you to create nonrepeating textures, expand the borders of photographs, and fill gaps in images. Gtexinator uses ImageMagick for image file support.
